CSACTIVEEFFECTS.CannotToggleEmbedded: Cannot toggle an Effect on an Embedded Item
CSACTIVEEFFECTS.CannotDeleteEmbedded: Cannot delete an Effect on an Embedded Item
CSACTIVEEFFECTS.AdjustValueWithMaxName: Adjust pool value when max changed
CSACTIVEEFFECTS.AdjustValueWithMaxHint: When checked, a pool's current value will be modified automatically when the pool's maximum value (the same amount will be added/subtracted to the current pool).
